wikipedia_page.main: George Henry Crisp (30 June 1911 – 1982) was a Welsh footballer who played in the Football League as a winger for Coventry City. He also represented Llanelli, Bristol Rovers, Newport County, Colchester United, Nottingham Forest and Merthyr Tydfil.

link_mentions.page: List of mayors and lord mayors of Hobart

response: * George Crisp (1911–1982), Welsh footballer who played for Coventry City.
